org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity
Class AeDynamicScopeCreator

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.AeDynamicScopeCreator
public class AeDynamicScopeCreator
extends java.lang.Object

Creates one or more child scope instances for a parallel forEach, onEvent, or onAlarm. The scopes that get created will NOT automatically be added to the parent's collection of children. This allows some flexibility by the caller to decide where the scope instance(s) should go.

          true if the scopes are being created for execution as opposed to being restored

Method Detail

create

public static java.util.List create(boolean aCreateFlag,
                                    IAeDynamicScopeParent aParent,
                                    int aStartInstance,
                                    int aFinalInstance)
Convenience method for creating a list of dynamic scopes. These scopes will not be part of the parent's children.

Parameters:
aCreateFlag - - true if we're creating for execution and the newly created objects and variables should be reported to the process.
aParent - - parent for the dynamic scopes
aStartInstance - - instance value to use for the first scope
aFinalInstance - - instance value to use for the final scope

create

protected void create()
Uses the IAeDefToImplVisitor to create all of the scopes needed. Each scope will receive custom location paths that include its instance id in its path.

protected boolean isCreateFlag()
